bs-checklist-desc: Used in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=ExtensionInfo}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=ExtensionInfo], description of checklist extension
bs-checklist-menu-insert-no-list-loaded: Label for disabled menu item placeholder when no list is loaded yet
bs-checklist-tag-checklist-desc:
Text for renders a checkbox or select field. Available configuration attributes:
{{Related|Bs-tag-desc}}
bs-checklist-dlg-new-list: Button text for creating a new checklist
bs-checklist-dlg-save-list: Button text for saving changes in a checklist
bs-checklist-dlg-items-label: Label for list of checklist items
bs-checklist-dlg-items-emptytext: Text when list of checklist items is empty
bs-checklist-dlg-items-hint: Text to remind the user to hit ENTER key after adding a new item to the list
bs-checklist-dlg-panel-title: Label for the left tree panel containing the available lists
bs-checklist-dlg-new-title: Title for the "Add new list" dialog.
bs-checklist-dlg-new-prompt: Text for the add new list prompt
bs-checklist-alert: Title for the alert that shows up when something went wrong.
bs-checklist-confirm-dirty-title: Title for the confirm dialog for unsaved changes.
bs-checklist-confirm-dirty-text: Title for the confirm dialog for unsaved changes. Phrase it in a way that the "Yes" option is the one where the users lose their changes.
log-name-bs-checklist: Used in [[Special:Log]], title of the log type
log-description-bs-checklist: Used in [[Special:Log]], description of the log type
logentry-bs-checklist-checked:
Log message about checking a check box on a page.
Parameters:
* $4 - number of the checkbox
* $3 - page identifier
logentry-bs-checklist-unchecked:
Log message about unchecking a check box on a page.
Parameters:
* $3 - name of the page containing the checkbox
* $4 - number of the checkbox
logentry-bs-checklist-selected:
Log message about selecting a value in a select box on a page.
Parameters:
* $3 - name of the page containing the checkbox
* $4 - number of the checkbox
* $5 - selected value
bs-checklist-savelist-error-invalid-titl: Error message in case invalid title was provided
bs-checklist-savelist-error-edit-not-per: Error message in case of insufficient user permissions
bs-checklist-modified-check: Edit summary about modifing checklist value
bs-checklist-summary-checked:
Edit summary when checking a checkbox
Parameters:
* $1 - number of the checkbox
bs-checklist-summary-unchecked:
Edit summary when unchecking a checkbox
Parameters:
* $1 - number of the checkbox
bs-checklist-summary-changed:
Edit summary when changing the value of a select box
Parameters:
* $1 - number of the select box
* $2 - selected value
apihelp-bs-checklist-available-options-s:
Describes the API endpoint that stores available options of checklist
{{doc-apihelp-summary|bs-checklist-available-options-store}}
apihelp-bs-checklist-template-store-summ:
Describes the API endpoint that stores checklist templates
{{doc-apihelp-summary|bs-checklist-template-store}}
apihelp-bs-checklist-tasks-summary:
Describes the API endpoint that handles checklist tasks
{{doc-apihelp-summary|bs-checklist-tasks}}
bs-tag-checklist: Name of the descriptor used in [[Special:UsageTracker|Special:UsageTracker]] output
bs-checklist-ve-checklistinspector-title: Label for the menu item and inspector title for checklist in VisualEditor
bs-checklist-ve-checklistinspector-cb-ch:
Label for the checkbox which indicates whether the checklist tag should be checked or unchecked
{{Identical|Checked}}
action-checklistmodify:
Allows modifing the values of checklist items without editing the wiki page.
{{doc-action|checklistmodify}}
right-checklistmodify:
Allows modifing the values of checklist items without editing the wiki page.
{{doc-right|checklistmodify}}
bs-checklist-config-markasminoredit: Label for setting to mark all checkbox and select box modifications as minor edits
tag-bs-checklist-change: Name for the revision tag to mark checkbox and select box changes
tag-bs-checklist-change-description: Description for the revision tag to mark checkbox and select box changes
bs-checklist-droplet-checklist-name: Title of droplet for tag Checklist
bs-checklist-droplet-checklist-desc: Description of droplet for tag Checklist
